steps: Hold a treat close to your pet's nose
Move your hand up, allowing their head to follow the treat and causing their bottom to lower
Once they're in a sitting position, say 'Sit'
Give them the treat and affection
common_issues: Pet jumps up instead of sitting
Pet walks backward instead of sitting
solutions: Try against a wall to prevent backing up
Use a lower treat position if jumping occurs

steps: Ask your pet to sit
Open the palm of your hand in front of you, and say 'Stay'
Take a few steps back
Return to your pet, give a treat, and affection
Gradually increase the distance and duration
common_issues: Pet stays briefly then breaks position
solutions: Practice in less distracting environments first

steps: Start in a quiet area with your pet on a leash
Say their name followed by 'Come' in a happy tone
Gently pull the leash toward you if needed
Reward with a treat and praise when they reach you
solutions: Practice in a distraction-free zone first

steps: Hold a treat near your pet's nose
Move your hand down to the floor, encouraging them to follow
As they lie down, say 'Down'
Reward with a treat and praise
common_issues: Pet only lowers head, not body
solutions: Move treat closer to the ground

steps: Start with your pet on your left side
Hold a treat near your leg to keep their attention
Say 'Heel' and start walking
Reward when they stay by your side
Place a treat on the floor and cover it with your hand
Say 'Leave it' and wait for your pet to stop trying
Reward with a different treat from your other hand
Gradually uncover the treat and increase difficulty
common_issues: Pet persists in trying to get the treat

steps: Start with your pet in a 'down' position
Hold a treat near their nose and move it toward their shoulder
As they roll to follow the treat, say 'Roll over'
Reward when they complete the roll
solutions: Keep them in 'down' with gentle pressure

steps: Take your pet outside first thing in the morning
Take them out after meals, naps, and playtime
Choose a specific spot and use a cue like 'Go potty'
Reward immediately after they eliminate outside
